detail_desc: Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill. High waist with adjustable elastication (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, back pockets and narrow hems.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with a concealed silicone trim and short sleeves. Overlocked edge around the top, sleeves and hem.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and a concealed zip in one side. Fake welt pockets at the back and slim legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with decorative gathers at the sides.

Shirt in a striped viscose weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Metal hoop earrings. Diameter 4.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and a draped front with a plastic ring at one side.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Rib-knit hat containing some wool with a faux fur pompom on the top.
Dress in lace made from a cotton blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Short cap sleeves and a seam at the waist. Partly lined in jersey.

Wide shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a detachable tie belt below the bust, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Socks knitted in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Long, round-necked T-shirt in slub cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with a wider neckline with raw roll edges. Open chest pocket, sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem at the front. Longer at the back.

Long-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, and two buttons at the top. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Wide waist belt in imitation leather with elastic and a metal fastener at the back. Double layered with a narrower strap in imitation suede that is knotted at the front. Width 4 cm.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.

Soft non-wired triangle bra in lace with microfibre-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and wide elastic at the hem with a fastening at the back.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered motif on the chest and a rounded hem. Knee-length shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
5-pocket denim jeans in cotton containing some linen. Relaxed fit with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, button placket and press-studs at the crotch.
Cold-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Sandals in imitation leather. Adjustable strap with a hook and loop fastening around the ankle and a grosgrain loop at the back. Moulded insoles in imitation suede and fluted soles.
Hat, mittens and tube scarf set in a soft jacquard knit. Hat with earflaps, a pompom on top and ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Tube-scarf with ribbed edges.
Coat in a woven wool blend with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, wide, rounded sleeves and a detachable tie belt. Lined.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered pattern. Deep V-neck, ties at the neckline, long wide raglan sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend in a wide, relaxed fit with a wrapover V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacket in fast-drying jersey with a hood and stand-up collar with a drawstring at the front. Zip, concealed side pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Print motif on one sleeve.
Imitation suede cap with covered elastication at the back. Lined.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Jacquard-weave top with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Boxy jacket in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, large buttons at the front, patch pockets with a flap and button and a concealed side pocket at the front. Dropped shoulders and straight sleeves with adjustable tabs and buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Long sweatshirt in a soft cotton blend with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and decorative elastic straps at the front.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with an interactive motif.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs, two with a pendant.
Double-breasted blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck and concealed press-studs at the front. Pleats at the waist and long sleeves with concealed press-studs at the cuffs.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams, elastication at the back of the waist and press-studs at the sides. Elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet, reflective details and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved body in stretch viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back decorated with a wide flounce, and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a boat neck, long, wide sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and wide ribbing at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Smart shirt in a woven cotton blend with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie or bow tie.

Fitted running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, a small zipped pocket at the back, reflective details and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with raw edges and a raw-edge hem.

High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide, elasticated panel to hold in and shape the waist and sculpting seams at the back to showcase the body’s physique. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Set in soft cotton jersey with a dress and leggings. Patterned dress with long sleeves, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Unlined. Ribbed leggings with an elasticated waist.
Metal watch with sparkly stones on its face, Diameter of face 3.5 cm, width of links approx. 1.5 cm, length of bracelet approx. 22 cm.
A-line dress in airy seersucker with covered elastication at the top and shoulder straps with decorative ties.
Narrow belts, one braided and one smooth, in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 1.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini top with an elasticated hem.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Bralette in soft lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a sheen. V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Gold-plated, thin metal chain necklace decorated with a bar-shaped metal bead. Adjustable length 39-45 cm.

Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a deep V-neck front and back and horizontal ties at the back. Flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.
Fully lined, one-shoulder bikini top with removable inserts. One shoulder strap with a decorative plastic ring, and no fasteners.
Fabric cap with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sandals with crossover straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles with a braided jute trim. Heel approx. 7 cm.

Set containing eight ear cuffs and four different hoop earrings in metal. Five of the pieces are decorated with sparkly glass beads and two with shimmering plastic pearls. Diameter from 1 cm to 2.5 cm.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed cotton jersey with long sleeves.

Short, wide dress in crinkled chiffon with a grandad collar and button placket. Long sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Lined with a short, V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved shirt in checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.

Long dress in airy, crinkled, patterned fabric with a V-neck front and back and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Lace trim around the neckline and waist, long sleeves with flounces, and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Partly lined.
Plastic water bottle with a handle and a non-drip lid with a straw.
